text.tspan: Standard conversions are implicit conversions with built-in meaning. Clause 4 enumerates the full set of such
conversions. A standard conversion sequence is a sequence of standard conversions in the following order:
1. Zero or one conversion from the following set: lvalue-to-rvalue conversion, array-to-pointer conversion,
2. Zero or one conversion from the following set: integral promotions, floating point promotion, integral
conversions, floating point conversions, floating-integral conversions, pointer conversions, pointer to
3. Zero or one function pointer conversion.
